video_prompt: Monochromatic clock hands smoothly advance, casting dynamic shadows that lengthen and shorten. Individual spheres forming numbers and hands subtly shift as lines extending from them ripple and change intensity. The entire clock face subtly rotates in a minimalist, textured environment.
image_prompt: Minimalist, monochromatic clock face, grey and black, light grey background. Clock, numbers 1-12, and hands constructed from countless tiny black spheres, creating a tactile texture. Thin, dark lines extend from spheres, suggesting shadows or strands. Hour hand at 12, minute hand slightly past 12. Detailed, high-contrast, artistic.
refined_video_prompt: Hands smoothly advance, casting shadows that dynamically lengthen and shorten. Spherical display elements subtly shift and reconfigure. Extending lines ripple and change intensity. The entire display subtly rotates.
